attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN LIGHT OF RECENT DEVELOPMENTS WITH MPS ACROSS ALL PARTIES IT IS THE VIEW OF THE PUBLIC TO CALL A GENERAL ELECTION.AS SOON AS POSSIBLE

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/

In any future petitions, please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. Petitions which are written in capital letters fall foul of our "wording that is impossible to understand" criteria, as explained in our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
